articles.title: Lung cancer: Study finds 11 distinct signs significantly associated with lung cancer - Times of India
articles.description: A research study on 698 primary lung cancer cases in adults diagnosed between January 1, 2012 and December 31, 2019 has found 11 signs and symptoms associated with a significantly higher chance of being a lung cancer case.The study has been published in medrx…
articles.content:
The study found the following 11 symptoms which are significantly associated with lung cancer:
finger clubbing
hemoptysis
cough
chest crackles or wheezing
lympadenopathy 
bone pain
weight loss… [+625 chars]
